The '''GDC build''' is a [[developer version]] of {{Edition|xbox 360}} showcased at the Game Developers' Conference 2012.<ref>{{ytl|8lDVYWeUDJQ|Minecraft - Xbox 360 tutorial mode (GDC 2012 build)|mcspotlighs|March 12, 2012}}</ref><ref>{{ytl|3e7u9MnzrfU|Minecraft Xbox 360 Multiplayer Demo Feature - GDC 2012|GameSpot|March 10, 2012}}</ref> This version is based off [[Java Edition Beta 1.6.6]].

== Additions ==
* Changed menu logo from [[File: Xbox 360 Edition logo 1.png|100px]] to [[File: Xbox 360 Edition logo 2.png|100px]].
* New loading screen with hints.
* Panorama now loops endlessly.
* New world selection menu.
* Splitscreen improved.
* New music.
* Sound quality improved.
* Large amount of undisclosed bug fixes and performance improvements.
* Changed the crafting menu and the tooltips.
